full_summary:
**Notice of Proposed Procurement: Rescue Sling**
======================================================================================================

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

*   Contract No.: CB-5327-41338824
*   Solicitation No.: W8485-237614/A
*   Publication Date: May 9, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: August 17, 2023 at 14:00 (EST)
*   Expected Contract Start Date: June 20, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of Rescue Sling equipment. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are strongly advised to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is being issued to secure the delivery of the following items:

*   Sling, Rescue Personnel GSIN 1670 (ARME Division) with the following specifications: Part No.: 9427033-1, NCAGE: 36376, 50 EA, to be delivered to CFSD Montreal and CFSD Edmonton
*   Sling, Rescue Personnel GSIN 1670 (ARME Division) with the following specifications: Part No.: 9427033-2, NCAGE: 36376, 50 EA, to be delivered to CFSD Montreal and CFSD Edmonton

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

The proposed procurement will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

**Deliverables**
---------------

*   Bidders must indicate their brand name, model, and/or Part Number, and the NCAGE they are offering for the proposed product.

**Important Notes**
-------------------

*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information contact:

*   Debbie Bergeron
*   Phone: 00
*   Email: [debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca](mailto:debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca)
*   Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2

**Attachment**
-------------

Annexes and supporting documents are available in the following links:

*   [Based on URL issued above]

----------------------

Best regards.
